TESSIE_API_KEY.description: Your Tessie API token from https://my.tessie.com/settings/api

capabilities.name: get_vehicle_current_state
capabilities.description: Get the current state of a vehicle including location, battery level, odometer reading

capabilities.name: get_driving_history
capabilities.description: Get driving history for a vehicle within a date range

capabilities.name: get_weekly_mileage
capabilities.description: Calculate total miles driven in a specific week or time period

capabilities.name: analyze_latest_drive
capabilities.description: Analyze the most recent drive with comprehensive metrics including duration, battery consumption, FSD usage, and drive merging for stops <7 minutes

capabilities.name: analyze_charging_costs
capabilities.description: Analyze charging sessions and costs from driving history, with recommendations to save money

capabilities.name: calculate_trip_cost
capabilities.description: Calculate the cost and environmental impact of completed trips with gas comparison and optimization tips

capabilities.name: estimate_future_trip
capabilities.description: Estimate cost and charging strategy for a planned trip based on distance and current battery level

capabilities.name: analyze_commute_patterns
capabilities.description: Detect regular commute routes and analyze efficiency trends, time patterns, and costs

capabilities.name: analyze_efficiency_trends
capabilities.description: Analyze driving efficiency trends over time with weather, speed, and time pattern insights

capabilities.name: get_smart_charging_reminders
capabilities.description: Get intelligent charging reminders and optimization strategy based on current vehicle state, usage patterns, and conditions

capabilities.name: get_vehicles
capabilities.description: List all vehicles in the Tessie account

capabilities.name: get_tire_pressure
capabilities.description: Get current tire pressure readings for all four tires with status indicators

capabilities.name: natural_language_query
capabilities.description: Process natural language queries about your vehicle data (e.g., "How many miles did I drive last week?")
